title: Building a {distil} website
description: How did I build this website?
contents:
As my first blogpost, I am going to list here all the resources that I used when building this website. So, if you are new to R markdown or distil, I hope this post will be helpful.
I first heard of distil on Twitter. What do you do when you hear about anything new? You google or youtube? That is what I did too! I ended up in Lisa Lendwayâ€™s website which by the way she built wiht distil;and there is also a Youtube video. This was already good enough to set up my webpage over night!
